scenario_text.value:
I can’t...do anything right... I’ll never...
be a hero...

You’re right. I never seem to do anything
right. I’ve probably held the others back.

But in spite of all that, there’s one thing
I can do better than anyone!
Something I can do...better than anyone?

I can act cheerful, stay positive, and always
be the life of the party!

And unlike some gloomy sap like you,
I can keep everyone’s spirits up!

Well said, Minoru. Nothing could be more
true.

The strength of your heart is where your true
power lies.
